itemLabel: Edwin McAlpine, Baron McAlpine of Moffat

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Edwin McAlpine, Baron McAlpine of Moffat (23 April 1907 – 7 January 1990), grandson of Sir Robert McAlpine, 1st Baronet, was a British construction magnate who headed Sir Robert McAlpine Ltd.
